data.name: Super Clown Adventures
data.detailed_description:
STORY:


You are Super Clown in this Super Mario styled 3d platformer. Super Clown need avoid different enemies like following slimes and big Mr Wombat enemies. Those enemies can be killed by jumping in their head or hitting Mr Wombat big red button. Also different traps like spikes and water need to be avoided. Traps hurt or kill player immediately. Super Clown main mission is to find pirate flag then level is finished. Also collecting hearths increase player health and collecting enough coins (5 coins) will give player extra lifes. Also falling from map could kill player. There are also falling and moving platforms.
For now 21 different themed levels

FEATURES:

- 21 levels
- Different enemies: Following slimes , bigger Mr Wombat enemies and immortal skeleton enemies
- Traps like spikes and dangerous water and frozen water
- Steam achievements
- Checkpoint system
- Hearth which give more energy
- Coins. collect 5 coins to give extra life

data.short_description: Be a Super clown. Beware Traps and different enemies and finish simple levels by finding pirate flag.....

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 8
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 800 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 900 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
